item.description:
Hey Guys,

Please join us for this summer's booze cruise on Boston Harbor. We did this last year and had a great time (check out last year's photos)

http://aussie.meetup....

The tickets are 2 for $40 or $25 each. You will need to purchase them through the following link. Tickets at the door will cost you $35.

http://www.bostoneven...

Info:

The boat is the MV Provincetown II at Bay State Cruise Co. located at 200 Seaport Blvd on the Commonwealth Pier. The Pier goes around the Boston side of the World Trade Center/Seaport Building. If you park at Anthony's or one of the surrounding lots just walk past the Seaport Bar then take an immediate left before the World Trade Center onto the Commonwealth Pier. The boat is halfway down the pier.

Ample lot parking is available starting at $8
Boarding at 7:15pm departing at 8:00pm sharp.
NO ATM/credit card are accepted on board
Your tickets will be waiting for you at the gate
For directions go to www.baystatecruisecompany.com

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Party Cruise
